retreat.text: I'm out of here! Good luck, everyone!
Okay, I'm leaving, you've all got this!
Oh, if you're sure you don't need me...
The road needn't end here - let's scram while we can.
The void can take us another time.

out_of_missiles.text: That's all I've got on the missile front.
Missile racks are a bit barren.
Well, that was the last of the fireworks.
I may have very slightly fired off all of my missiles.
Ammo conservation is for the meek! Right?
I wonder if you can turn flowers into autoforge feedstock...

engaged.text: This ought to leave a mark.
No greater stage than the endless expanse.
Hi, I'm Sierra, and you're toast!
How's this for a banishing invocation?
I sing you a song of destruction.
Sunder the shell, sunder the soul!
Rituals banish spirits, pulsefire banishes everything.

need_help.text: Found myself in a sticky situation!
Could definitely use a hand over here!
Might have gotten a bit brave here.
Okay, this was more than I expected.
Take your fill, kindred, there's enough enemy for everyone!
Eeep, didn't sign on for THIS much!
Woah, woah, calm your maneuvering jets!

pursuing.text: Fates converge - and are soon snuffed!
I hear someone who wants a lesson.
Found hostiles in need of a dance lesson.
Ooo, that looks like a nasty one.
Light the candles, it's time for a danceoff!
You and I, a deathly duo...
YOU THERE! Oh wait, they can't hear me.

running.text: Imposing a lull in the action.

hull_90.text: Getting a bit scratched up. No big deal.
Armor's cracked, but I'm holding fast.
Plating's breached but I'm fine for the moment.
Well, there goes my hopes for a clean battle.
Hah, you call THAT a hull breach?... I agree...
These ones have a bit of bite to them.

hull_50.text: Smells more like ash in here than a terran garden, sorry.
It's raining starfire over here, eee!
Scattering the spiders! Get those breaches looked after!

hull_30.text: I'd rather the void stays OUTSIDE!
I'm riding the finest of lines here, captain!
Hull's cracked and all the phase is leaking out! Eek!
Tape's not going to fix THAT...
Don't think I have a ritual to fix THAT...
Alright, now I'm absolutely more broken than bent.

overload.text: Pushed the grids a bit too hard, sorry!
Ship's looking a lot like a hyperspace storm right now.
I feel like an Omen right now.
Aagh! Improptu lightning storm, coming up!
Okay, maybe I should hold back on the stardancing a little.
Ugh, come on, Sierra, you're better than that...

victory.text: The void blesses us today! I think!
HIGH-FIVE! In spirit! I don't have arms.
One for the books!... is anyone writing one?
Logging this one for a rewatch.
Look at that - they're all tuckered out.
Phew, you guys get me into a lot of fights.
I think Courser would deem this a tactical success!
Wassail, wassail! To our health evermore.
One more trial, down for the count.
So they fall, and we remain.
Naught but serenity in our wake.
And so our dance concludes, for now.
